content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Congratulations! You won a free lottery! Claim now!!! Visit spamlink.com
It seems like this message is not related to our services. To keep our system efficient, I am marking this conversation as spam. Have a great day!
reason: Message content unrelated to services, identified as spam
